name: Void Runner (itch)
description:
Void Runner Teleport Through Obstacles In This Fast-Paced Infinite Runner

In Void Runner, your objective is to survive for as long as you can by avoiding obstacles. In this infinite runner, you teleport instead of jumping. This means you can teleport through obstacles, but be careful, teleport too soon and you might end up in a wall.

Void Runner was created in collaboration with my brother. We were inspired by other infinite runners but wanted to take a different approach to how you avoid obstacles. We hope you enjoy playing Void Runner as much as we enjoyed making it.
